net.electroland.lighting.detector
Class Recipient

java.lang.Object
  net.electroland.lighting.detector.Recipient
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtNetRecipient, FlexXMLRecipient, HaleUDPRecipient
public abstract class Recipient
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class that acts as a bridge between detectors, rasters, and DMX lighting fixtures. The only method that concrete implementations need to implement is send(byte[]), which actually sends the bytes to the fixture, using the appropriate protocol. See ArtNetDMXLightingFixture.

Author:
geilfuss

universe - - the byte id of this lighting fixtures DMX universe
ipStr - - the ip address for the lighting controller for this fixture
port - - the port the lighting controller is listening on
channels - - the total number light channels this fixture is supporting
